claims.name: WL3_NOGO
claims.statement: The instance family T_n resists all WL^3 / FO^3 refinements up to the certified threshold.

claims.name: Oblivion_Slice_k3_D3_R2
claims.statement: For k=3, Î”=3, R=2, the finite ball automaton has bounded SCC structure, preventing unbounded local cycle-rank growth under FO^3-local homogeneity.
